messages.messageBody:
-=-Here's why to buy it from me today if you're in the U.S.: If you don't have Amazon prime and you don't want to wait a week for media mail, nor to pay so much for priority.
I send all mine from the house by priority and you'll have it in a day or two or three depending how far from Albuquerque you live.-=-

And the link I left out :-)

First request: Buy it from Amazon

Plan B: Buy it from me here:
http://sandradodd.com/bigbook/order

Sandra

messages.subject: The Big Book of Unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: I ve never been very good at saying Buy my book! but today would be a good day for it if you were considering getting one anyway.
messages.messageBody:
I've never been very good at saying "Buy my book!" but today would be a good day for it if you were considering getting one anyway.

http://www.amazon.com/Big-Book-Unschooling-Sandra-Dodd/dp/0557181550

In a couple of days, Amazon will charge me by the cubic foot of storage, and the Big Book honestly is big.

If you're not in the U.S., buy it whenever you want to (though I think your parenting might benefit from having it). Amazon does print-on-demand in Europe and Australia and maybe Canada. But Americans get print-on-demand from lulu.com, and Amazon is selling paper copies I shipped to them.


Here's why to buy it from me today if you're in the U.S.: If you don't have Amazon prime and you don't want to wait a week for media mail, nor to pay so much for priority.
I send all mine from the house by priority and you'll have it in a day or two or three depending how far from Albuquerque you live.

Thanks!
Sandra

messages.subject: The Big Book of Unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: I have two requests.  One is that if anyone is planning to buy a book soon, please do it before February 7, as I m leaving town for two weeks and Keith will
messages.messageBody:
I have two requests. One is that if anyone is planning to buy a book soon, please do it before February 7, as I'm leaving town for two weeks and Keith will not be able to mail books for me. **

The other is actually more important and pressing.

If any of you are the typo-marking type, the page-turned-down AHA! sort, and if you know of typos in The Big Book, please let me know. I have two marked in my book, but would not be surprised if there were a few more.

If you have the very first edition (look inside the front, and if it says Good Vibrations Conference Edition--and if you want to trade it for another one, we can do that).... never mind.

IF (this is embarrassing) someone just recently or in the near future gets one that says Good Vibrations Conference Edition and it has a bunch of marks on pages, that's mine. I'd like to have it back and send you a new book and a Free Prize (of some sort). When my shelf fell down
http://sandradodd.blogspot.com/2010/12/too-many-books.html
it is possible that my personal copy of the first edition went into a package. I would feel terrible if I sent someone a first pass with the typos marked. YUCK!

On page 10, there should be a space between Rules and discourage.
I have one on page 223 (live should be lived).

Any more?

**Holly has said if Keith can advise her, she can mail books while I'm gone. That is a possibility, but books bought before the 7th and after the 22nd get better handling with no trouble to the guy who's having a shoulder replaced. :-/ Thanks.

Sandra
